    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws ConnectionException
        Initiates a connect request to ADP Authorization Server on the type of connection configuration. Validations are performed on the connection configurations and if request is valid access token will be issued and Token is mapped with this connection. In case of error, connection exceptions are thrown or error details are returned
        Specified by:
        connect in interface ADPAPIConnection
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - exception thrown when validation fails on configuration and connection

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws ConnectionException
        Invokes API to disconnect the connection - currently this method is implemented to reset the connection to null.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface ADPAPIConnection
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - throws exceptions in the event of object

      • isConnectionIndicator

        public boolean isConnectionIndicator()
        Returns true or false based on the validation or access token.
        Specified by:
        isConnectionIndicator in interface ADPAPIConnection
        Returns:
        boolean returns true when token is valid and not expired

      • getConnectionConfiguration

        public ConnectionConfiguration getConnectionConfiguration()
        Returns the Connection configuration
